channel.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
channel.description: I'm trying to make a code that stops people from making more than 4 accounts per host ip. Can someone help?

item.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:22, topic:342500”][quote author=frostscapeserver link=topic=438907.msg3226037#msg3226037 date=1275588713]
I’m not a coder. All I know is the basics- adding npcs, adding shops, models etc.
[/quote]
Thats called dling delta and editing those cfg files LOL[/quote]

Thats that thing called spam. Gtfo if you’re not gonna help me. I don’t code but I’ve fixed most of the server so it doesn’t completely suck and not just in the cfg files, I’ve done modeling, fixing class8-20 so stfu

Read full topic

item.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

frostscapeserver:

Yeah I’m not a coder but I’m just trying to import it it =s People keep making new accounts and trading the starters once the 10 minute limit wears off.

Like i’ve said before. Your best bet is to keep a track of all the accounts that get registered to a certain IP. Or embed it with SMF so that it’s only 1 account per email address.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“frostscapeserver, post:17, topic:342500”]Well most of the people who play wont know that. I know there’s no 100% guarantee but can you help me write a code for it?
if (connectingfrom"+ip+") {

Idk something like that? :0[/quote]

That is wrong on so many levels.

I guess you could use a HashMap<Socket, Integer> for the connecting socket, and the number of open connections from that socket.(socket.getAddress() or w/e)

Read full topic

item.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“frostscapeserver, post:15, topic:342500”]Can’t you just block the host instead?
Ex.
pool-173-64-127-9.bltmmd.fios.verizon.net[/quote]

Dynamic IPs prevent those from being at all useful. I mean really, you could unplug your ethernet cord from the router, plug it back int, and you(well, at least I) have a new IP.

Read full topic

I’m not a coder. All I know is the basics- adding npcs, adding shops, models etc.

item.source: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help

item.title: Ip restriction? Trying to make a code- Please Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“frostscapeserver, post:3, topic:342500”]Wow man! That was great tut! Thnx for everything…
look I just want a code to limit the amount of accounts someone can make so that they dont keep making new accounts for the starters. I’ve got a 10 minute trade limit once you make an account but people just wait… =[/quote]

I’m going to tell you the concept. You program it yourself.

Option A: Make a separate file that has a list of every IP that’s been connected, along with how many accoutns have been connected with that IP. Load them all on start up, and then whenever a new connection is received, check the list, if there’s more than 4, socket.close();

Option B: Make use of a MySQL Table for every account. In that table, contain at LEAST the username, and the connecting IP. Then execute this query:

SELECT * FROM `accounts_table_name` WHERE `connecting_ip` = 'connecting ip here'

If the number of rows returned is == 4, socket.close();

Read full topic
